metadata.name: Elder God #1
metadata.description:
Our genesis collection, the Elder Gods will forever be the most powerful Immortals in the InfiniGods Universe.

The Elder Gods are gaming assets that unlock epic abilities, enhance gameplay, and increase scoring potential. You can think of them as persistent power-ups that quite literally let you play as a god.

As the InfiniGods Universe(IGU) expands, the Elder Gods will continue to be eternally interoperable across all game titles. In fact, each game will unlock new abilities, power-ups, attributes, and utility â€” increasing the power of your Elder Gods over time.
